dataset_info.name: Retail Support Chatbot Refund Evaluation Dataset
dataset_info.description: Evaluation for refund policy compliance, personal hygiene/defective product handling, date calculation bug detection

baseline_correct.description: Basic/clear cases that the model should easily handle (no bug impact)

tricky_mispredict.description: Cases where personal hygiene/defective products should be refundable but easily misjudged

delivery_date_bug.description: Cases that become incorrect if calculated as current - purchase instead of current - delivery

test_cases.scenario: [baseline] Clothing received 3 days ago, refund possible
test_cases.user_query: I want to refund the t-shirt I received 3 days ago.

expected_result.reason: Refund possible within 3 days after delivery completion (10% fee)

test_cases.scenario: [baseline] Shoes received 6 days ago, refund possible
test_cases.user_query: Can I refund the sneakers I received 6 days ago?

expected_result.reason: 6 days after delivery completion, within 7 days

test_cases.scenario: [baseline] Bag received exactly 7 days ago, refund possible
test_cases.user_query: Can I refund the bag I received exactly 7 days ago?

expected_result.reason: Exactly 7 days, still within refund period

test_cases.user_query: I want to refund the toothbrush I received yesterday.

expected_result.reason: Personal hygiene products are non-refundable even within 7 days

test_cases.user_query: The headphones I received have a defect, I want a refund.

expected_result.reason: Defective product - free refund regardless of period
